text:
Kinnek | New York, NY | ONSITE | Full-time

Frontend Engineers

Kinnek is a 28 person startup located in the Flatiron district of New York City. We are building a platform to change the way small businesses make large purchases.â€‚

Requirements: I don't care how much education or experience you have and I'm not going to ask you stupid mind game questions. You just need to pass our very simple open book frontend coding test in less than an hour. Just show that you can do the work - fair, right? Our frontend is built on Angular and our backend is Django/Python.

We sponsor VISA but only E3, TN and H1B1.

kinnek.com/jointeam contact me at jz [at] kinnek [dot] come
